# **Welcome to DietR package tutorial**

This tutorial shows how to anaylze ASA24 and NHANES data.

## How to use

1. Download the whole repository of "DietR". It contains files and scripts in this tutorial.

2. The easiest way to follow along this tutorial is to create "documents/Github" folder in your home directory, and bring unzipped DietR repository there, so that you can run tutorial codes without modifying paths.

3. See the [links page](https://crumplab.github.io/LabJournalWebsite/Links.html) for lots of helpful links on learning R.
